Text: So this rip has the original portoguese audio? Also at 130min runtime it should have definitly been a 2CD rip instead, hopefully the quality is ok.

To Atmosfear:
Yep, it's the portugese audio.
It's 124 min long and I don't think the quality of a 2CD version would be better unless you compare them frame by frame. Take a look at it and post a comment here to tell me what you think.

Where can I find the english subs for this video? And once I have them...do I just use vobsub or something similar to get it up?

English sub files for city of gods can be located on:
http://subtitles.images.o2.cz/37/Mc
Download the required sub file. (both 2 disk & single disk files are here)
Extract to folder where the film is located. 
Play the film & click on the green icon that appears in the system tray. 
Open the sub file & apply.
The film will now play english subs
